b9df81996022b890956046b3385217f7dbf86c4c.commitMessage: Issue #2661: Enforce ForbidCCommentsInMethodsCheck of sevntu-checkstyle over Checkstyle source code

46a52f84c014e4d25379f429f11ed3de11fe8ae7.commitMessage:
Issue #1555: Rename methods returning boolean to use question word

Fixes some `BooleanMethodNameMustStartWithQuestion` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports boolean methods whose names do not start with a question word. Boolean methods that override library methods are ignored by this inspection.

Fixes some `SpellCheckingInspection` inspection violations.

Description:

788b41973d5747c7b4699a853b62168cf0001df6.commitMessage:
Changes to make it possible to identify a module by an id, and then to
suppress messages based on the id. The motivation is to allow for finer
grained suppressions. For example, can enable multiple instances of the
Regexp check, and suppress on the individual instance.
